comments:
When I try to drag & drop a directory to the editor area, I see the following exception logged to the PDE Error Log. I think that drag & drop of directories to the editor should be disabled.

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: assertion failed: )

I tried to reproduce this one but it seems okay for me.  Dragging a directory just does a noop.  Is this something that you can hit consistently?

this is now fixed.  The problem was that the EditorAreaDropAdapter expects the data of a drag event to be non-null, even if it never happens.  I've changed the code to set the data to be a 0 length array.
Cannot be tested on MacOS since DND does not work from RSE views there. Will retest on Windows.
